alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 3:47PM EDT until September 01 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. Alafia River At Lithia affecting Hillsborough County. .Storm surge and heavy rainfall associated with Hurricane Idalia is causing some local rivers to rise into Flood Stage over the next couple of days. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alafia River at Lithia. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, River Drive and Squirrel Run Way downstream of County Road 640 are completely covered by water. One home begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 6.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.0 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.0 feet on 07/21/1959. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Alafia River Lithia 13.0 6.2 Wed 3 pm 12.0 12.8 11.9 10.4 8.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM EDT.
